comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when drag report items from Palette to Layout.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070403-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Drag report items from Palette to Layout.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
